title: Why the fuck would you disable a champion because of a lore event?
body:
Like, does Riot not understand that some people don't give a shit about the event, and would like to use the champ/skins they spent time earning/spent money on?

This is the most unprofessional thing Riot has done in a LOOONG time... 

...Nvm, just remembered the hud update

Edit: yo dont gimme any of that Draven x Barrel shit https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3f32vh/bilgewater_burning_tides_act_3/ctkvshy
